name: Mustang Survival Cascade Foam Vest - Unisex
description: Simple and effective, this low-profile PFD provides comfortable performance for the active paddler. A large, expanding pocket keeps sunscreen and other personal items handy.Durable 420-denier nylon ripstop is light and dries fast.Breathable mesh liner and padded neoprene shoulders provide a comfortable fit.Over-the-head entry with Z-Strap cinch adjustment system fits comfortably and securely.Fleece-lined zippered handwarmer tunnel pocket.Expanding mesh front pocket with dual zippers.SONAS reflective hits keep you visible.Back attachment point allows towing.Meets Harmonized Level 70 buoyancy standard. Approved by Transport Canada and US Coast Guard.
